main_testimonial.text: I was tired of my social media links opening in apps' internal browsers... Then I discovered PIMMS! It's the best way to boost conversions — all thanks to deep linking ❤️

problem.title: The Problem
problem.heading: You're losing conversions
problem.description: Every time your links open a mini-browser integrated into an app, you're losing conversions.

more.description1: No one wants to be trapped in a mini-browser to interact with your contents. Your visitors don't either.
more.description2: Users are frustrated for many reasons, including social accounts disconnection, payment processors not working, etc. Most people abandon before subscribing or buying.
more.description3: Traditional links create friction in the user journey, damaging your reputation and reducing engagement rates.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.heading: Share deeplinks to convert
solution.description: <logo>PIMMS</logo> opens your contents in the official mobile apps used by your users daily.

more.description1: deeplink automatically detects the user's device and opens the link in the most appropriate mobile application.
more.title2: Seamless user experience without losing users
more.description2: Visitors stay engaged and as a result, you get much more conversions, engagement and time spent on your contents.
more.description3: In real-time and throughout the year, you can easily track the performance and the clicks on your deeplinks.

free_offer.title: Free access to <logo>PIMMS</logo>
free_offer.description: Never lose conversions again - start with 10 free deeplinks today.

main_testimonial.text: I was tired of my social media links opening in apps' internal browsers... Then I discovered PIMMS! It's the best way to boost conversions — all thanks to deep linking ❤️

problem.title: The Problem
problem.heading: You're losing subscribers
problem.description: Every time your YouTube links don't open in the official YouTube app, you're losing new subscribers because the user experience is poor.

more.description1: No one wants to be trapped in a mini-browser integrated into a social network or an app (like LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitch, ...). Your visitors don't either.
more.description2: Without automatic connection to their YouTube account, users leave your channel without subscribing.
more.description3: Traditional links create friction in the user journey, damaging your online reputation and reducing engagement rates.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.heading: Share deeplinks to grow
solution.description: <logo>PIMMS</logo> opens your videos in the official YouTube app, creating a seamless experience that increases subscribers and engagement.

more.description1: deeplink automatically detects the user's device and opens the link in the official YouTube app.
more.description2: Viewers highly prefer the official YouTube app that they use daily. As a result, you get much more subscribers and engagement.
more.description3: Get easily the performance of your deeplinks from a real-time dashboard throughout the year.

free_offer.title: Free access to <logo>PIMMS</logo>
free_offer.description: Stop losing subscribers on YouTube - start with 10 free deeplinks today.
